name: Downfall: The Last Straw (demo)
description:
A while ago, I had the idea to push the Downfall parody/Hitler rants meme in new directions. I originally did so, by making a 31 minute Flash animated special, "Fegelein turns Hitler & the Bunker into a Flash Cartoon", and I later saw that Unterganger "FegeleinTheLostTapes" made a Megaman inspired platformer based on the Downfall meme in Multimedia Fusion 2. Since I've always been a part of Clickteam game development, and wanted to go back to my roots, and also because unfortunately, the Hitler rants meme has been stagnant for years and I may retire soon, I want this to be my swan song.

In the mean time, I present to you, a three-level demo + music player/tutorial. (There may be bugs/glitches, and some gameplay may be flawed, but it's a work in progress, don't worry, I'm playtesting it constantly!)
